short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple countdown timer for your new tab page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a very simple new tab page that allows you to beautify your new tab page in a very minimal way.
Choose between displaying the current time or a countdown to a specified date, and customize the new tab page with a random background image or a minimal gray gradient.
There's not much more to it, really. Enjoy!
